about_the_game:
[Nothorian is coming out BETA in June 6, 2025 ]

Enter a classic Action-style Roguelike ARPG-MMORPG world and go through the 4 Acts of the world to reach Hell itself and defeat the 3 most threatening Demons in the Nothorian world.

The Lord of Chaos, imprisoned in hell since time immemorial, has returned to achieve his long-awaited dream, crossing the Portal of Destiny to access our world and sow Terror. Currently, the power of an Ancestral Goddess that only remains in the memory of those who knew of her existence, emerges agai

n and new Heroes mysteriously appear where they have everything necessary to try to find and defeat the Lord of Hell before he manages to reach us.

The Player will be able to manage and customize their characters in a solid ARPGMMORPG adventure with possible future expansions, with an original and epic soundtrack that will accompany players during the many hours that this title offers us, providing a dynamic and classic approach increasingly closer in search of new constructions for your characters.

By defeating the 3 Great Demons you will gain access to the Endgame Dungeons, each designed to offer a different environment and challenges to obtain new types of more powerful items.

Begin your adventure with the Relentless Warrior, the Powerful Wizard, or the Versatile Nightshade.

  • [The Warrior] prioritizes the range of his Strength, Physical Defense and has more health, can unleash powerful melee attacks and some from a distance, is able to withstand large amounts of Aggression.

  • [The Wizard] prioritizes the range of his Intelligence, Magic Resistance and has more Mana, controls Fire, Ice, Lightning and Wind, thanks to the elements he can cause great damage from a distance and control the situation.

  • [The Nightshade] prioritizes the range of his Versatility, Dexterity and has the resources to neutralize the enemy and come out unscathed with his Stealth, controls Bows better and chooses to use Daggers, can poison and cause great damage quickly.

  • Explore 4 extensive Acts in search of Story Bosses to complete the Story.

  • Gather your courage to face the difficult Endgame Raids alongside your Guild.

  • Collect Trade Cards from Elite Enemies that will increase your power and exchange them for Epic Cards.

  • Try to Create powerful Runes by formulating Words.

  • With up to 40+ equipment slots and 2 evolutions of each Spell or Skill, create your Builds.

  • Craft equipment at the Blacksmith, Gems at the Jeweler, Bandages and Backpacks, food and Potions at the Alchemist.

  • Manage your Inventory and the Excessive Loot you'll find as you explore the world and its Dungeons.

  • Test your bravery in the End-game PVP Zones.
